```{r, echo=FALSE}
desc <- suppressWarnings(readLines("DESCRIPTION"))
regex <- "(^Version:\\s+)(\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+)"
loc <- grep(regex, desc)
ver <- gsub(regex, "\\2", desc[loc])
verbadge <- sprintf('<a href="https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-%s-orange.svg"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-%s-orange.svg" alt="Version"/></a></p>', ver, ver)
````

# Installation

To download the development version of **medium2jekyll**:

Download the [zip ball](https://github.com/data-steve/medium2jekyll/zipball/master) or [tar ball](https://github.com/data-steve/medium2jekyll/tarball/master), decompress and run `R CMD INSTALL` on it, or use the **pacman** package to install the development version:

```r
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load_gh("data-steve/medium2jekyll")
```
